description.english: Unlock all achievements
description.german: Schalte alle Erfolge frei.
description.french: Déverrouillez toutes les prouesses
description.italian: Sblocca tutti gli obiettivi.

description.portuguese: Desbloquear todas as conquistas
description.brazilian: Desbloquear todas as conquistas

description.english: Accept Ripburger's Final Offer

description.spanish: Acepta la última oferta de Ripburger.
description.portuguese: Aceitar a oferta final do Ripburger
description.brazilian: Aceitar a oferta final do Ripburger

displayName.english: Not Puttin' My Lips on That
displayName.german: Da lass ich meinen Mund nicht dran
displayName.french: Pas question que je mette ma bouche là-dessus
displayName.italian: Non ci metto certo la bocca
displayName.spanish: No me pienso llevar eso a la boca
displayName.portuguese: Eu não boto a boca nisso
displayName.brazilian: Eu não boto a boca nisso

description.english: Keep Your Lips Off of 10 Objects
description.german: Lass deinen Mund an 10 Objekte nicht ran.
description.french: Ne mettez pas 10 objets à la bouche
description.italian: Tieni lontane le labbra da 10 oggetti.
description.spanish: Evita llevarte a la boca 10 objetos.
description.portuguese: Manter sua boca longe de 10 objetos
description.brazilian: Manter sua boca longe de 10 objetos

description.english: Get your keys from the bartender
description.german: Hol dir deine Schlüssel vom Barkeeper.

description.italian: Prendi le chiavi dal barista.
description.spanish: Quítale las llaves al camarero.
description.portuguese: Obter as chaves do barman
description.brazilian: Obter as chaves do barman

displayName.french: Le chef de ces enfoirés de Putois

description.english: Take Out the first Rottwheeler

description.english: Check out the photo of Uncle Pete

description.brazilian: Conferir a foto do tio Pete

description.english: Finish all of Mo's initial dialog

description.english: Keep talking to Todd

description.portuguese: Continue falando com o Todd
description.brazilian: Continue falando com o Todd

description.english: Kick in the trailer door
description.german: Tritt die Wohnwagentür ein.

description.brazilian: Chutar a porta do trailer

description.english: Retrieve Mo's welding torch

description.brazilian: Recuperar o maçarico da Mo

description.portuguese: Abrir a tranca da torre

description.english: Siphon gas from Floyd

description.brazilian: Obter a identidade falsa com Miranda

description.english: Consume Father Torque's wisdom

description.english: Use the fertilizer to spin out Nestor and Bolus

description.brazilian: Obter a motosserra com o fertilizante

description.english: Talk your way out of getting quartered

description.portuguese: Evitar ser esquartejado usando a lábia

description.portuguese: Fazer os irmãos Boom Boom irem pelos ares.
description.brazilian: Fazer os irmãos Boom Boom irem pelos ares.

description.english: Kick the crack to open the secret passage

description.portuguese: Chutar a fenda para abrir a passagem secreta
description.brazilian: Chutar a fenda para abrir a passagem secreta

description.english: Melt Ripburger's vision of the future

description.brazilian: Meter fogo na visão do futuro do Ripburger

description.english: Kill the LOOM Seagull

description.spanish: Mata a la gaviota de

description.brazilian: Assistir aos coelhinhos invadindo os créditos
